description.value:
Variant of the Wolf Pelt Chapter Trapping (Adds +2 to Intimidate Tests). Also provides 2d10 Requisition Points and reduces Renown restrictions of all weapons, armour, and gear (not relics or chapter specific items) by 10.

Requirements

Space Wolves Chapter Only.

Effect: Distinguished

Notes: 20 R
